mapper.select:
select distinct d.no as no ,d.address as address ,d.dealDate as dealDate ,d.aptName as aptName ,d.area as area ,d.floor as floor ,d.buildYear as buildYear ,d.dealAmount as dealAmount ,d.rentmoney as rentMoney ,d.type as type ,i.lat as lat ,i.lng as lng from housedeal d join houseinfo i on d.address = i.address and d.aptName = i.aptName where type in(${typeInStr})
and d.address like concat('%', #{address}, '%')
and d.aptName like concat('%', #{aptName}, '%')
order by ${orderBy} ${orderType}

select distinct d.no as no ,d.address as address ,d.dealDate as dealDate ,d.aptName as aptName ,d.area as area ,d.floor as floor ,d.buildYear as buildYear ,d.dealAmount as dealAmount ,d.rentmoney as rentMoney ,d.type as type ,i.lat as lat ,i.lng as lng from housedeal d join houseinfo i on d.address = i.address and d.aptName = i.aptName where d.no = #{value}

select count(distinct d.no) as cnt from housedeal d join houseinfo i on d.address = i.address and d.aptName = i.aptName
type in(${typeInStr})
and d.address like concat('%', #{address}, '%')
and d.aptName like concat('%', #{aptName}, '%')

select distinct d.no as no ,d.dealDate as dealDate ,d.dealAmount as dealAmount ,d.rentmoney as rentMoney from housedeal d join houseinfo i on d.address = i.address and d.aptName = i.aptName where d.address = #{address} and d.aptName = #{aptName} and d.type = #{type} order by dealDate
select distinct g.gugun_name as gugun_name from sidocode s join guguncode g on left(s.sido_code, 2) = left(g.gugun_code, 2) where s.sido_name = #{value} order by gugun_name
select distinct d.dong as dong from guguncode g join dongcode d on left(g.gugun_code, 5) = d.dongcode where g.gugun_name = #{value} order by dong;
